function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high CO2 concentrations in inpatient wards","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and compromised patient and staff health","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, increasing air exchange rates, and implementing air purification technology","Technologies":"Air purifiers, mechanical ventilation systems, and air exchange units","People":"Patients, medical staff, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management and maintenance team"},{"Description":"Insufficient air purification leading to high PM2.5 concentrations in various hospital areas","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission and compromised patient and staff health","Mitigation":"Implementing air purification technology, regular maintenance of air filters, and improving air filtration systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV germicidal irradiation, and air purifiers","People":"Patients, medical staff, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management and maintenance team"},{"Description":"Correlations between subjective and objective IEQ data","Impact":"Misinterpretation of indoor environmental quality and potential oversight of critical issues","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough data analysis, cross-referencing subjective and objective data, and ensuring consistent monitoring and measurement standards","Technologies":"Data analytics software, IEQ monitoring devices, and standardized measurement protocols","People":"Researchers, hospital management, maintenance team","Owner":"Research institutions, hospital management"}]}
